entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quaqtaq Airport 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: -22.2°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -25.7°C
Wind: NW 51 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blizzard developing early this evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
